title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.6 - Metering requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.6 - Metering requirements

State Regulations

If not directly communicating with gaming device meters, an interface element shall maintain separate electronic meters, of sufficient
length, to preclude the loss of information from meter rollovers or a means to
identify multiple rollovers, as provided for in the connected gaming device. Such electronic meters should be capable of being reviewed on demand, at the
interface-element level via an authorized access method. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5317.6

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
